sec.p: In addition to the data on juvenile cuckoos, we included tracks of adults from Finland and Scandinavia. Tracks of two adult cuckoos (two autumn migrations) from 2014, one caught near Oulu and one near Ruokolahti were included, as were published tracks of 11 adult birds (18 autumn migrations) from Scandinavia (Denmark: 10 tracks from four adults [ 13]; South Sweden: four tracks from four adults [ 13]; North Sweden: four tracks from three adults [ 12]). For comparison with juvenile birds, we lumped the adult tracks into two different groupsâ€“northern adults (North Swedish and Finnish) and southern adults (Danish and South Swedish). Transmission stopped in three birds before arrival south of the Sahara Desert ( Fig 1, S2 Table).
